) VALUES ( #{category_code}, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(INFO_NO),0)+1 FROM INFO_BOARD ), #{member_id}, #{info_board_title}, #{info_board_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT INFO_NO, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_DATE FROM ( SELECT INFO_NO, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_CODE, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INFO_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM INFO_BOARD) mp WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{rowEnd, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY INFO_NO DESC
SELECT INFO_NO, MEMBER_ID, INFO_BOARD_TITLE, INFO_BOARD_CONTENT, INFO_BOARD_DATE, CATEGORY_CODE FROM INFO_BOARD WHERE INFO_NO = #{info_no}
SELECT COUNT(INFO_NO) FROM INFO_BOARD WHERE INFO_NO > 0
